name: Stick Em Up
storyline: The options for pulling off your heists are nearly endless, alert the police by coming in loud, manipulate your hostages and the clerks into giving you the valuables, use your hostages to keep the police at bay, or be swift and silence all the witnesses before anyone can be called to the scene. Observe your targets, build your arsenal, take your hostages, and escape with a fat bag of cash...
summary: Stick Em Up, is a game in which you will use your skills, your wits, and your arsenal of guns and explosives to pull off cunning, exciting, and sometimes messy heists. Watch as your skills take you from robbing lonely gas stations to the most massive banks.
